name: Love Death (Hololive fangame)
description:
Kiara is in love with Death!

But she's a phoenix so she can't die you know, always coming back to life and everything...

Well in this pixel art platformer inspired by Takanashi Kiara from Hololive, it's up to you to find a way to die in each level!

How long will it take you to complete the 60 levels?

Oh you finished it already? Well go ahead and make your own levels in the level editor! Share them with us, we might as well add them to the game.

Maybe.

Who made this though??

Almost all the development : Mrzozo https://mrzozo.itch.io/

Sprites, sounds, levels : Sukaichae https://sukaichae.itch.io/

~ ♥ ~

Thanks for playing!
